Uses of Class
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.LoopStmt

Packages that use LoopStmt 
Package Description
edu.citadel.cprl  
edu.citadel.cprl.ast  

  • Uses of LoopStmt in edu.citadel.cprl

    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl that return LoopStmt 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    LoopStmt LoopContext.getLoopStmt()
    Returns the loop statement currently being parsed.
    LoopStmt Parser.parseLoopStmt()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    loopStmt = ( "while" booleanExpr )? "loop" statements "end" "loop" ";" .
    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl with parameters of type LoopStmt 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void LoopContext.beginLoop​(LoopStmt stmt)
    Called when starting to parse a loop statement.

  • Uses of LoopStmt in edu.citadel.cprl.ast

    Constructors in edu.citadel.cprl.ast with parameters of type LoopStmt 
    Constructor Description
    ExitStmt​(Expression whenExpr, LoopStmt loopStmt)
    Construct an exit statement with its optional "when" expression (which should be null if there is no "when" expression) and a reference to the enclosing loop statement.
